experiences.title: SDE (Frontend)
description: Developed and maintained React.js user interfaces for an internal enterprise application using Material UI.
Built reusable and responsive UI components aligned with business requirements.
Integrated REST APIs developed in Spring Boot to fetch and display data in the frontend.
Utilized React Query for API data fetching and caching, improving data handling and UI responsiveness.
Debugged frontend and API integration issues to improve application stability.
Worked in an Agile development environment following sprint-based delivery.

experiences.title: Software Engineer & Instructor (Part-time)
description: Development: Collaborated with a small team to develop the frontend of a real estate client application using React.js.
Conducted React.js training sessions for 20+ students, covering components, hooks, and state management.
